if (NOT WIN32 AND NOT PCSX2_CORE)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "This CMakeLists is only for Windows, use a system package on mac/linux")
endif()

add_library(wx30_config
	include/wx/msw/wx.rc)
	
target_include_directories(wx30_config PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include" include)
set_target_properties(wx30_config PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)

if(WIN32)
	add_custom_command(
		OUTPUT "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include/wx/setup.h"
		COMMAND "${CMAKE_COMMAND}" -E copy "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/wx/msw/setup.h" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include/wx/setup.h"
		DEPENDS include/wx/msw/setup.h
	)
	add_custom_command(
		OUTPUT "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include/wx/msw/rcdefs.h"
		COMMAND "${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}" "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}" /EP /nologo "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/wx/msw/genrcdefs.h" > "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include/wx/msw/rcdefs.h"
		DEPENDS include/wx/msw/genrcdefs.h
	)
	target_sources(wx30_config PRIVATE
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include/wx/setup.h"
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/include/wx/msw/rcdefs.h"
	)
elseif(ANDROID)
	target_include_directories(wx30_config PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/wx/android")
else()
	target_include_directories(wx30_config PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/unix")
endif()

# WX internal shared settings
add_library(wx30_buildparams INTERFACE)
target_compile_definitions(wx30_buildparams INTERFACE
	WXBUILDING
)

if(WIN32)
	target_compile_definitions(wx30_buildparams INTERFACE
		_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE=1
		_SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS=1
		__WXMSW__
		_UNICODE
	)
endif()
target_include_directories(wx30_buildparams INTERFACE include)
target_precompile_headers(wx30_buildparams INTERFACE <wx/wxprec.h>)
target_link_libraries(wx30_buildparams INTERFACE wx30_config)

add_library(wx30_base
	src/common/any.cpp
	src/common/appbase.cpp
	src/common/arcall.cpp
	src/common/arcfind.cpp
	src/common/archive.cpp
	src/common/arrstr.cpp

	target_sources(wx30_base PRIVATE
		src/msw/basemsw.cpp
		src/msw/crashrpt.cpp
		src/msw/dde.cpp
		src/msw/debughlp.cpp
		src/msw/dir.cpp

		src/msw/fswatcher.cpp

		src/msw/mimetype.cpp

		include/wx/msw/chkconf.h

		include/wx/msw/regconf.h

		include/wx/msw/wrapcdlg.h
		include/wx/msw/wrapwin.h
	)
else()
	target_sources(wx30_base PRIVATE
		src/unix/appunix.cpp
		src/unix/dialup.cpp
		src/unix/dir.cpp
		src/unix/dlunix.cpp
		src/unix/epolldispatcher.cpp

		src/unix/fdiounix.cpp
		src/unix/fswatcher_inotify.cpp
		src/unix/fswatcher_kqueue.cpp
		src/unix/joystick.cpp
		src/unix/mediactrl.cpp
		src/unix/mimetype.cpp
#		src/unix/net.cpp
		src/unix/snglinst.cpp
		src/unix/sockunix.cpp
		src/unix/sound.cpp
		src/unix/sound_sdl.cpp
		src/unix/stackwalk.cpp
		src/unix/stdpaths.cpp
		src/unix/threadpsx.cpp
		src/unix/timerunx.cpp
		src/unix/utilsunx.cpp
		src/unix/utilsx11.cpp
		src/unix/wakeuppipe.cpp
	)
endif()

set_source_files_properties(src/common/extended.c PROPERTIES SKIP_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS ON)
target_compile_definitions(wx30_base PRIVATE wxUSE_GUI=0 wxUSE_BASE=1)
target_link_libraries(wx30_base PUBLIC wx30_config PRIVATE ZLIB::ZLIB wx30_buildparams)

	add_library(wx30_core
		src/common/accelcmn.cpp

		include/wx/aboutdlg.h

		include/wx/bannerwindow.h
		include/wx/bmpcbox.h

		include/wx/commandlinkbutton.h
		include/wx/dataview.h

		include/wx/dateevt.h
		include/wx/datetimectrl.h
		include/wx/dcbuffer.h
		include/wx/dvrenderers.h
		include/wx/editlbox.h
		include/wx/grid.h
		include/wx/hyperlink.h
		include/wx/joystick.h
		include/wx/laywin.h
		include/wx/notifmsg.h
		include/wx/odcombo.h
		include/wx/propdlg.h
		include/wx/richtooltip.h
		include/wx/sashwin.h
		include/wx/sound.h
		include/wx/splash.h
		include/wx/taskbar.h
		include/wx/timectrl.h
		include/wx/tipdlg.h
		include/wx/treelist.h
		include/wx/wizard.h
	)
	target_link_libraries(wx30_adv PUBLIC wx30_config PRIVATE wx30_buildparams)

	add_library(wx30_all INTERFACE)
	target_link_libraries(wx30_all INTERFACE wx30_adv wx30_base wx30_core)
	add_library(wxWidgets::all ALIAS wx30_all)
else()
	add_library(wx30_all INTERFACE)
	target_link_libraries(wx30_all INTERFACE wx30_base)
	add_library(wxWidgets::all ALIAS wx30_all)
endif()
